The golden cabinet of true treasure: containing the summe of morall philosophie. Translated out of French & enlarged, by W. Ievvel, Mr of Arts, of Exeter Colledge in Oxford Jewell, William, b. 1585 or 6.

Printed by H. L[ownes] for Iohn Crosley, At London : 1612.
Printer's name from STC. Dedication signed: William Iewell. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
